MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Lintmill Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.43AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further work required to repair a section of our underground cable network near Main Street and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.24AM on 26 December 2020.
